item.description: This hike is in the Green Mtns. near Mt. Tabor. The rating is moderate to difficult. The first ~2.0 mi. is the steepest part, after which the trail divides, one side going to Baker Peak and the other to Griffith Lake. I would like to hit both areas; by my estimate, that would be ~8 mi. RT and take ~7.5 hours. If that seems too much and we do only one part, I would go to Baker Peak for the views, and that should be only 5.6 mi. RT and 4.75 hours. Map and further information: http://1.usa.gov/Is40yJ

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Griffith Lake & Baker Peak on Saturday
